Articles.Content:
1 hour ago, viperwolf said:

@akron If i may

I would like to use your AACS Advanced Attitude Control System for a mechjeb case. Basically take all the guts out of the MJ case a put them into the AACS case. I like that little case for that purpose, but I also want to keep the Original aswell. Its for my personal use only, and Ive done this in the past with another part. However, your parts are set up way different than what im use to.

Sure. Go for it. I'm just not sure what you need from me. Also. Fyi I already have mechjeb and Engineer enabled on that part. I'm assuming you need it setup differently.

1 minute ago, akron said:

Sure. Go for it. I'm just not sure what you need from me. Also. Fyi I already have mechjeb and Engineer enabled on that part. I'm assuming you need it setup differently. 

Thank you, but i cant find all the files i need to go along with it. I cannot get it to show up for anything when i make the change.

3 hours ago, viperwolf said:

Thank you, but i cant find all the files i need to go along with it. I cannot get it to show up for anything when i make the change.

I would just copy the cfg and change the part name. It will still reference the part in my mod and you can then make whatever changes you want. What is it you're trying to do that the mechJeb config does not already? Just curious

13 minutes ago, akron said:

I would just copy the cfg and change the part name. It will still reference the part in my mod and you can then make whatever changes you want. What is it you're trying to do that the mechJeb config does not already? Just curious

Im trying to use it to test some of my stock set ups without any mods installed, just mechjeb. Thats why I need the actual file locations/names that use the AACS.

1 minute ago, viperwolf said:

Im trying to use it to test some of my stock set ups without any mods installed, just mechjeb. Thats why I need the actual file locations/names that use the AACS.

Coatl Aerospace/ProbesPlus/Assets/aacs.mu

Coatl Aerospace/ProbesPlus/Assets/probes_a_D.dds

Coatl Aerospace/ProbesPlus/Parts/Control/aacs.cfg

1 minute ago, akron said:

Coatl Aerospace/ProbesPlus/Assets/aacs.mu

Coatl Aerospace/ProbesPlus/Assets/probes_a_D.dds

Coatl Aerospace/ProbesPlus/Parts/Control/aacs.cfg

 

Thank you, I appreciate it. I guess mechjeb will never update the case lol
Sorry if this question was already asked, but are there any parts modeled after any of the Mars rovers?

6 hours ago, gaooo said:

Sorry if this question was already asked, but are there any parts modeled after any of the Mars rovers?

No, not yet.

22 hours ago, gaooo said:

Sorry if this question was already asked, but are there any parts modeled after any of the Mars rovers?

Like @Cheesecake mentioned, no, not yet. Viking is coming on the next update, and I don't think I can avoid rover parts for much longer after that.

By the way, welcome to Forums!

Thank you!

5 hours ago, akron said:

Viking is coming on the next update, and I don't think I can avoid rover parts for much longer after that.

Awesome, can't wait.

I've started meddling again with the mod files. I hope to fix those rcs and get some other issues solved starting this week. Look out for random Github pushes if you wanna test. I just fixed the disappearing Draco and TexturesUnlimited compatibility. More to come
Hi. I can not find the details for the descent vehicle of Huygens, as in these photos. How to solve this problem?

18 hours ago, Hafym said:

Hi. I can not find the details for the descent vehicle of Huygens, as in these photos. How to solve this problem?

Welcome to the Forum. Try this, go the the Github page (LINK) and download the latest repository. Instructions are on that page. Install that update and let me know if it fixes the issue

@Gordon Dry I just had that happen to me in my new 1.4.2 test install. KSP's texture referencing is absolute crap. I'll either not be able to save you guys some RAM (by using duplicate files) or simply reduce model quality. I'll probably just reduce detail on the Juno magnetometer because it's not that critical.

It's 2018, things should just work
Well, Unity ... and stuff. But it's 2018 for real, 3D-knitting-machines are the newest things a nerd could have...
Why does this say it works with 1.4.1 when it doesn't?

5 minutes ago, mercaholic75 said:

Why does this say it works with 1.4.1 when it doesn't?

You might want to research the term "WIP", hint: it means "Work In Progress"!

This mod is basically beta or in a very early state but pretty much usable!
I think the drop box link is just outdated. I think I got it working now.

18 minutes ago, mercaholic75 said:

I think the drop box link is just outdated. I think I got it working now.

It works in 1.4.x with some know issues mostly with the newer, more complex parts and the RCS effects (Which affected all mods using the old module, not just mine)

The Github repository will always have the latest WIP version if you want to try the latest release. I posted the link up in the page. As @LatiMacciato said, it is a work in progress. the Github repository always has the latest.
@akron did you know the CA-AD1-R Small Folding Relay Antenna perfectly fits ontop of the Lynx Rover?

2 hours ago, LatiMacciato said:

@akron did you know the CA-AD1-R Small Folding Relay Antenna perfectly fits ontop of the Lynx Rover?

Lol, I thought I was the only one!
@LatiMacciato That is very cool. No I have not used those rovers in a while
